text: this incredible genius was still very
human very human you know we often think
that if someone's good in one thing
they're like good and everything when it
comes to Einstein it turns out that's
not exactly the case so Einstein of
course was great mathematician great
physicist he liked also to play the
violin and there's a wonderful little
story and I don't remember the exact
details of it but Einstein is playing
violin with a very well-known musician
and the musician keeps stopping Einstein
every time he comes in they get a few
bars and he keeps stopping them because
he says Einstein you're coming in at the
wrong time he says Einstein can't you
count and Einstein apparently had
difficulty counting keeping rhythm when
it came to music so the fact that his
mind could touch the edge of the
universe did not mean that somehow he
was radically different he was a guy an
unusual guy in terms of how he can
manipulate equations but really he was
in effect just one of us
